name: Seasons of Greed
description:
In this fast paced, one-button-input, 2D sidescrolling game, you play as Aidan McMohadeishu. A brash, young enterpreneur who, after inheriting his father's wealth, decides to do what every other rational human being would do: INVEST! INVEST! INVEST! Help Aidan duplicate his wealth by investing in shops, and businesses in accordance with the seasons. But beware, for they change frequently. You must be fast, focussed and above all...AMBITIOUS! 

--------------------------------------------CREDITS-----------------------------------------

Tobias Heukäufer: Programming, game assembly, animation (https://iche20.itch.io/)

Jasmin Stahn: Game art, environment design (https://jstahn.itch.io/)

Mark Braasch: Character design, animation. (https://subbucket.itch.io/)

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences.

Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai

"Games A Week" (Winter Semester 2020/21)
